name: De/Orbit
description: Take control of a small planet named "Ratha"; your objective is to build small modular rockets and shoot them to other planets to slowly drain from their velocity until they deorbit into The Sun. Bigger fuel payloads and higher impact velocities will drain a larger amount of velocity from planets - but be mindful of the amount of fuel you are using when getting to your destination, and of the other planets that are trying to do the same!
